snippet: At least 15 people were killed after police fired tear gas in a crowded football stadium in Democratic Republic of Congo, provoking a stampede, according to a police source and a local official....

headline.print_headline: At Least 15 Killed in Congo Football Stadium Stampede
headline.main: At Least 15 Killed in Congo Football Stadium Stampede

lead_paragraph: At least 15 people were killed after police fired tear gas in a crowded football stadium in Democratic Republic of Congo, provoking a stampede, according to a police source and a local official.
